name: Sour Cream Cookies
ingredients: 3/4 cup sour cream 2 tsp baking powder
1 8 oz cream cheese 1 box 16 ox powdered sugar (1 lb or 4 cups)
1 cup shortening (1/2 butter or margarine) 1 tsp baking soda
steps: Cream together butter and sugar. . Add eggs, sour cream and vanilla. Mix well. Add dry ingredients.
full 9 minutes) Cool and then frost. I add rainbow sprinkles to mine.
Cream together sugar and shortening. Add eggs and vanilla. Add Sour cream. Add dry ingredients. This dough
is very rich. You need to work a little flour in it before you can roll it out -­‐ or else refrigerate it for awhile.
Roll on floured surface. Cut with cookie cutters. Reroll scrapes, etc.
Bake at 350 for about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with colored sugar before baking or frost after.
